title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\V1\Value
name: Value
description:
A message that can hold any of the supported value types and associated metadata.

Generated from protobuf message google.datastore.v1.Value

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.null_value
params.description: A null value.

params.name: data.boolean_value
params.description: A boolean value.

params.name: data.integer_value
params.description: An integer value.

params.name: data.double_value
params.description: A double value.

params.name: data.timestamp_value
params.description: A timestamp value. When stored in the Datastore, precise only to microseconds; any additional precision is rounded down.

params.name: data.key_value
params.description: A key value.

params.name: data.string_value
params.description: A UTF-8 encoded string value. When exclude_from_indexes is false (it is indexed) , may have at most 1500 bytes. Otherwise, may be set to at most 1,000,000 bytes.

params.name: data.blob_value
params.description: A blob value. May have at most 1,000,000 bytes. When exclude_from_indexes is false, may have at most 1500 bytes. In JSON requests, must be base64-encoded.

params.name: data.geo_point_value
params.description: A geo point value representing a point on the surface of Earth.

params.name: data.entity_value
params.description: An entity value. - May have no key. - May have a key with an incomplete key path. - May have a reserved/read-only key.

params.name: data.array_value
params.description: An array value. Cannot contain another array value. A Value instance that sets field array_value must not set fields meaning or exclude_from_indexes.

params.name: data.meaning
params.description: The meaning field should only be populated for backwards compatibility.

params.name: data.exclude_from_indexes
params.description: If the value should be excluded from all indexes including those defined explicitly.
